## Documentation Architecture

```
docs/
├── manifest.json                    ← Layer 1: Machine-readable codebase map
├── coverage.json                    ← Layer 4: Staleness + JSDoc coverage
├── SYSTEM_MAP.md                    ← Layer 4: Dependency graphs (Mermaid)
├── COMPONENT_CATALOG.md             ← Layer 3: Auto-generated component index
├── SERVICE_REFERENCE.md             ← Layer 3: Auto-generated service index
├── PAGES_REFERENCE.md               ← Layer 3: Auto-generated pages index
├── HOOKS_REFERENCE.md               ← Layer 3: Auto-generated hooks reference
│
├── architecture/                    ← Layer 5: Human + AI maintained
│   ├── SYSTEM_ARCHITECTURE.md
│   ├── INVOICE_ARCHITECTURE.md
│   ├── DATABASE_SCHEMA.md
│   ├── INVENTORY_SYSTEM.md
│   ├── INVENTORY_SCHEMA.md
│   └── API_REFERENCE.md
│
├── guides/                          ← Human-written, staleness-tracked
│   ├── USER_GUIDE.md
│   ├── DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md
│   ├── ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md
│   ├── TROUBLESHOOTING.md
│   ├── CONTRIBUTING.md
│   ├── TESTING_GUIDE.md
│   ├── VOICE_RECOGNITION_GUIDE.md
│   └── WEBSITE_BUILDER.md
│
├── legal/                           ← Legal compliance
│   ├── DATA_PROTECTION_REQUIREMENTS.md
│   ├── CODING_STANDARDS.txt
│   └── SECURITY_SUMMARY.md
│
├── status/                          ← Project tracking
│   ├── PROJECT_STATUS.md
│   ├── TODO.md
│   └── CRITICAL_ISSUES.md
│
└── README.md                        ← This file
```
